meta.description: Find the minimum travel cost for a salesperson to visit each of five cities exactly once and return to the starting city.

sets.name: CITIES
sets.description: Set of cities the salesperson needs to visit.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if the salesperson travels from city i to city j.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(travel_cost[i][j] * x[i][j] for i in CITIES for j in CITIES if i != j)
objective.description: Minimize the total travel cost for the salesperson.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_1
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['1'][j] for j in CITIES if j != '1')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesperson leaves city 1 exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_2
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['2'][j] for j in CITIES if j != '2')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesperson leaves city 2 exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_3
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['3'][j] for j in CITIES if j != '3')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesperson leaves city 3 exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_4
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['4'][j] for j in CITIES if j != '4')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesperson leaves city 4 exactly once.

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_5
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x['5'][j] for j in CITIES if j != '5')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesperson leaves city 5 exactly once.

constraints.name: return_to_start_1
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['1'] for i in CITIES if i != '1')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesperson returns to city 1 exactly once.

constraints.name: return_to_start_2
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['2'] for i in CITIES if i != '2')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesperson returns to city 2 exactly once.

constraints.name: return_to_start_3
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['3'] for i in CITIES if i != '3')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesperson returns to city 3 exactly once.

constraints.name: return_to_start_4
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['4'] for i in CITIES if i != '4')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesperson returns to city 4 exactly once.

constraints.name: return_to_start_5
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(x[i]['5'] for i in CITIES if i != '5')
constraints.description: Ensure the salesperson returns to city 5 exactly once.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_1
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint for cities 1 and 2.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_2
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint for cities 1 and 3.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_3
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint for cities 1 and 4.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_4
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint for cities 1 and 5.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_5
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint for cities 2 and 3.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_6
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint for cities 2 and 4.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_7
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint for cities 2 and 5.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_8
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint for cities 3 and 4.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_9
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint for cities 3 and 5.

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_10
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint for cities 4 and 5.
